trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around August 4th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsUnfortunately my story would be a movie and if I attempt to tell it, It would probably take as long. So I will only comment on this creature. I had been hearing clicking noises lately every time I came out of the front door, but I could never tell where they were comming from. So on the night of August 4, 2011 at 9:35 pm I took camera in hand and decided to stand out front and listen for the noise again. When I heard it I snapped this picture. there seems to be lots of them here, but this one seems to be the only one that has tried to communicate.
Summary: A bluish/green small humanoid like creature riding on craft with appendages
